index.create-survey: Create a new survey for free

login.header: Signup or Login to your account
login.body-1: Accounts allow you to keep track of your surveys and votes.

body-2.right: accounts, which are only accessible from your current browser and are permanently lost once you logout.

vote.requires-auth: You need to login to vote
vote.body: Paste the Survey's ID to join it

no-assigned-choices.header: You haven't been assigned any items
no-assigned-choices.description: This may happen if no items were added to the survey yet or if no items are available for you to pick. Try again later.

voting.comparisons-counter: No comparisons left | Last comparison | {count} comparisons left

vote.requires-registered-auth: You can't vote anonymously on this survey

vote-action.error: Oops! There was an error while voting!

skip-action.error: Oops! There was an error while skipping!
